title: We dont give free 400 rp or hextech boxes to begginers anymore?
body: I made this account for my friend im just wondering why he didnt get a free hextech box

replies.body: I took a look over this accounts hextech history, and it looks like you did recently get the new player chest and were able to open it. Seems like you were got Ashe and Garen along with his Sanguine skin!
